item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V1.2.0.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V1.2.0.0 Dear Customers, We have released Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V1.2.0.0! In this new release, we greatly enhanced standard RDL support. Now you can migrate your existing RDL files very easily. What’s New? Support Matices in standard RDLs Support Subreports in standard RDLs

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V1.1.1 Released! Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V1.1.1 Released! What’s Improved? Rewrote the client tool, improved its stability Supported to sub-report design Supported to manual input report range Supported composite markers What’s Fixeded? Fixed the installation bug when multiple instances of SQL Server Reporting Serverices are installed in the same machine Fixed the insert formula bug when not choosing a dataset

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.1.0.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services 1.1.0.0 Dear Customers, We have released Aspose.Cells.ReportingServices V1.1.0.0. What’s New? We provide a client add-in tool - Aspose Cells Report Designer which allows users to use MS Excel as a report design tool. With Aspose Cells Report Designer users can design a report template in Excel instead of Visual Studio or other report builder tool. The report template is embedded in Reporting Services RDL file and can be published to Report Server.
